= Requirement Analysis =
 
 = 1.Functional Requirements =
 
 == 1.1 User Profiles ==
1.1.1 Each user shall have information fields such as his/her name, surname, contact address(e-mail) and password.

1.1.2 Registrations shall be checked for validation via e-mail. 

1.1.3 Users shall login the site by using e-mail address and password.

1.1.4 Users should login with a facebook account.

1.1.5 Users should edit their profile page.

1.1.6 Users should acquire their passwords if forgotten.

1.1.7 + Users shall add their skills, jobs and locations to their profiles to relate them with the tasks.

1.1.8. + User shall have a page that contains other users' comments about his previous tasks.




 == 1.2 Home Page ==

1.2.1  Registered users shall login with his/her e-mail address as user id and password from this page.

1.2.2 + The tasks matches with user skills and locations shall be suggested with high priority

1.2.3. + Urgent tasks determined by moderators shall be shown in main page's urgent tasks part

1.2.3. + Guests shall see a list of latest and urgent tasks.

 == 1.3 Searching ==

1.3.1 + Users should search by location, tag and any token.

1.3.2 System also should suggest new areas according to their past searches or tasks.

 == 1.4 Task ==
1.4.1 User should open a new task.

1.4.2 User that opened the task should edit the task that they have privileges on.


1.4.3 + User shall be able to delete tasks with no feedbacks. 

1.4.4 User that opened the task shall have the option to close the incoming donation automatically if the target need is met.

1.4.6 Users shall give donations via paypal or credit card.

1.4.7 Users shall give feedbacks about a task.

1.4.8. + User shall share tasks via facebook or twitter.

1.4.9. + User shall be able to follow tasks.

1.4.10 . + Multimedia content such as video and picture shall be added to tasks.

 == 1.5 Tagging ==
1.5.1 Users shall tag their threads.

1.5.2 Users shall use up to 10 tags.

1.5.3 Users shall tag their threads according to their thread's content.


 ==1.6 Rating System == 
1.6.1 Users should earn points by helping a task fulfilled.

1.6.2 + Users shall give points to the tasks which will be used for the task ordering in the home page.

1.6.3. + Number of completed task shall be stored for task owner.


1.6.4 + Users that have the most points shall be able to feature their tasks on the main page.

== 1.7 Privacy ==
1.7.1 The user shall be able to arrange the visibility of their information etc.

17.2 The guests shall see the content that they are allowed to see by the users.

 = 2.Non-Functional Requirements =

 == 2.1 Operating & Platform constraints ==
2.1.1 The application should be supported by Google Chrome (All version), Safari (4.1.3 or higher), Internet Explorer (7 or higher) and Mozilla Firefox (12 or higher).

 == 2.2 Modifiability ==
2.2.1 The system should be designed in a modular manner so that the developers can modify it to respond the varying needs of users.

 == 2.3 Portability ==
2.3.1 A mobile application to interact with users shall be supported with less features relative to the web application.
2.3.2 Mobile application shall be implemented for Android devices.

 == 2.4 Security ==
2.4.1 The application shall be accessed via a user authentification process. (i.e. sign in). The contents shall be public. Only members shall manipulate the contents.
2.4.2. Registration shall be validated.

 == 2.5 Usability ==
2.5.1 The user interface of the application should be similar to popular task management applications (e.g. PivotalTracker) at the launch stage to achieve ease of use.
2.5.2 There shall be more visual design to focus than the content.

 == 2.6 Language ==
2.6.1 The language of the application shall be in English.

 == 2.7 Response Time ==
2.7.1 Response time of the web pages and database queries should be less than five seconds with an average quality Internet connection.

 == 2.8 Reliability ==
2.8.1 All the records and database shall be copied for possible failures and the copied data should be updated periodically (daily).

 == 2.9 System Availability ==
 2.9.2 The user interface of the system shall be available during day and the maintenance shall be performed at nights when necessary.

 == 2.10 Physical Requirements ==
2.10.1 System shall be written using an IDE in Windows, OS X or Linux operating systems.

 == 2.11 Design ==
2.11.1 Design of home page should be simple and user friendly.

2.11.2 Color choices should be done consciously.

2.11.3 Homepage shall consist the recent urgent tasks.

 == 2.12 + Search engine Optimization==
 
2.12.1 + When a new task is created the URL should be formed according to
header of the task which is important for search engine indexing.
